posts.post_content:
[Diabolic Edict](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diabolic Edict), [Mana Drain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mana Drain), [Ancestral Recall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ancestral Recall), [Terminate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terminate), I could go on, there are exactly 800 results on the Gatherer that can be put on the stick.  
  
A question: if you imprint a split card, can you copy either half of it with the Scepter, even if only one half is CMC 2? I think that you can, but I'm not 100% sure.

posts.post_content:
I have become convinced that this is the most misread card in all of MTG. Its like people have combo's for the card before they even finish reading it. I've seen people try to imprint some crazy stuff.  
[Balance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Balance), [burning wish](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=burning wish), [pyroclasm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=pyroclasm), [demonic tutor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=demonic tutor), even saw someone try to imprint [Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God) once.  
And just from comments posted here...  
[dragon fodder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=dragon fodder) = no  
[time walk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=time walk) = no  
[wrench mind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=wrench mind), [duress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=duress), [rampant growth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=rampant growth), [rite of flame](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=rite of flame), [shahrazad](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=shahrazad) = no no no no no  
  
[day of the dragons](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=day of the dragons) ??? = squirrelbeary has a sense of humor ;)
posts.html:
I have become convinced that this is the most misread card in all of MTG. Its like people have combo's for the card before they even finish reading it. I've seen people try to imprint some crazy stuff.
Balance, burning wish, pyroclasm, demonic tutor, even saw someone try to imprint Wrath of God once.
And just from comments posted here...
dragon fodder = no
time walk = no
wrench mind, duress, rampant growth, rite of flame, shahrazad = no no no no no

day of the dragons ??? = squirrelbeary has a sense of humor ;)

Posted By: Phanthomas (2/29/2012 4:16:35 AM)

posts.post_content:
Isochron Scepter(imprinted with [High Tide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=High Tide)), [Fatestitcher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fatestitcher) enchanted with [Pemmin's Aura](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pemmin's Aura), A few Islands, and a [Drowner Initiate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drowner Initiate).   
  
Listen to the cries of your enemies as you farm nearly endless mana and mill their deck into dust.  
  
1. Tap Scepter for High Tide (double U output of islands).  
2. Pay U to Trigger Drowner Initiate Ability (mill two of a opponent's cards) for casting High Tide Copy.  
2. Tap all Ilands in your possession.  
3. Tap Fatestitcher to Untap Isochron Scepter.  
4. Pay U to Untap Fatestitcher via Pemmin's Aura.  
5. Tap Fatestitcher to Untap an Island  
6. Pay U to Untap Fatestitcher via Pemmin's Aura.  
7. Repeat Steps 5-6 as required to untap all islands  
8. Repeat from Step 1 (yes recasting High Tide Copy).  
9. Win Game when opponent is unable to draw a card.
posts.html:
Isochron Scepter(imprinted with High Tide), Fatestitcher enchanted with Pemmin's Aura, A few Islands, and a Drowner Initiate.

Listen to the cries of your enemies as you farm nearly endless mana and mill their deck into dust.

1. Tap Scepter for High Tide (double U output of islands).
2. Pay U to Trigger Drowner Initiate Ability (mill two of a opponent's cards) for casting High Tide Copy.
2. Tap all Ilands in your possession.
3. Tap Fatestitcher to Untap Isochron Scepter.
4. Pay U to Untap Fatestitcher via Pemmin's Aura.
5. Tap Fatestitcher to Untap an Island
6. Pay U to Untap Fatestitcher via Pemmin's Aura.
7. Repeat Steps 5-6 as required to untap all islands
8. Repeat from Step 1 (yes recasting High Tide Copy).
9. Win Game when opponent is unable to draw a card.
